before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"fmr5l","text":"Buffers, beads, columns are chillled at 4°C prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"719mm","text":"Expression and purification of human LRRK2 and its variants from insect cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ckidf","text":"if not otherwise mentioned every step was performed on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajpd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"7nd1b","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac0ig","text":"Centrifuge: Thermo Scientific Sorvall LYNX 6000
AKTA: ÄKTA start; ÄKTA Pure 25","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv4td","text":"Ni-NTA (Cytiva #17531803)
SP-sepharose column (Cytiva #17505701)
HiLoad 16/600 Superdex 200 pg gel filtration column
Amicon Ultra 15 mL Centrifugal Filters 10,000 MWCO (Millipore)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dbcv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e44jn","text":"Buffers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ficnf","text":"Lysis buffer: 50 mM HEPES 7.4 , 500 mM NaCl, 20 mM imidazole, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 µM GDP, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol
Ni-NTA elution buffer: 50 mM HEPES 7.4, 500 mM NaCl, 300 mM imidazole, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 µM GDP, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":71,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":190,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kmqk","text":"no salt buffer: 20 mM HEPES 7.4, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 µM GDP, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol
high salt buffer: 20 mM HEPES 7.4, 2.5 M NaCl, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 µM GDP, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol
gel filtration buffer: 20 mM HEPES 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 µM GDP, 0.5 mM TCEP, 0.5% glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":42,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":137,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":238,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e4qhb","text":"exponentially growing SF9 cells (2x10^6 cells/mL in Lonza Insect-XPRESS medium) are transduced with high-titre bacculovirus suspension (encoding TEV cleavable N-terminally His6-Z-tagged human LRRK2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdeu3","text":"After shaking with  at for  , cells are harvested by centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"29bh4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"90","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"27","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":237600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8kejs","text":"Pellets are washed once with PBS and frozen until further use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cg4ph","text":"Cell pellets are resuspended in lysis buffer and lysed by sonication on ice using a 13-mm probe (35% amplitude, 5 sec pulse, 10 sec pause, 5 min total pulse time).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m6uh","text":"Lysate is cleared by ultracentrifugation for 1 hour with  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e9ifm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hkav","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"100.000","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"evj60","text":"Clarified lysate is loaded onto pre-equilibrated Ni-NTA in gravity flow columns.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5f6l8","text":"After extensive washing with lysis buffer  (20 CV), the His-tagged protein is eluted with elution buffer containing  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b721n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.300","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Imidazole","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"712ij","text":"After dilution of the eluate's salt concentration to   using no salt buffer, the protein is loaded onto a SP sepharose column connected to an Äkta Start system (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sue7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"250","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"NaCl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uoko","text":"After washing with buffer containing   the bound LRRK2 construct is eluted with a salt gradient ranging from 250 mM to 2.5 M NaCl while elution fractions are collected throughout the run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9j5h5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"250","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"NaCl","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eoi2","text":"Peak fractions are pooled and TEV protease (molar ratio of 1:100) is added during overnight incubation rolling at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6dttt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5kh3","text":"Cleaved tag, TEV protease and other contaminating proteins are removed by an combined SP sephareose-Ni-NTA rebinding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crqrg","text":"LRRK2 construct is concentrated and subjected to gel filtration in gel filtration buffer on a HiLoad 16/600 S200 column using an Äkta Pure system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9nkpv","text":"Peak fractions are combined, the protein is concentrated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuqt4","text":"the UV absorbance is measure and the protein is flash frozen in liquid nitrogen for storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
